column2: ALPHA BLACK TO PAPA BEAR. WE HAVE REPELLED THE RED ASSAULT. OVER.
PAPA BEAR TO ALL FORCES. RUSSIAN FORCES SPOTTED ON WEST, SOUTH AND EAST. GET READY, DEFEND MONTIGNAC AT ALL COSTS. PAPA BEAR OUT.
PAPA BEAR TO ALPHA BLACK. ROGER THAT. OUT.
PAPA BEAR TO ALPHA. UNDERSTOOD. MISSION IS ACCOMPLISHED. OUT.
